label: A2B3_mC20_12_2i_3i-003
title: $\alpha$-As$_{2}$Te$_{3}$ Structure
comments:
The ICSD entry lists \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B2_mC20_12_3i_2i-002}{Gd$_{2}$Cl$_{3}$} as the prototype, but we find that the structures are different enough to warrant giving $\alpha$-As$_{2}$Te$_{3}$ its own entry. 
 As$_{2}$Te$_{3}$ can also be found as $\beta$-As$_{2}$Te$_{3}$, which has the \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B3_hR5_166_c_ac-001}{$C33$ (Bi$_{2}$Te$_{3}$) structure}. (Morin, 2015) 
 There are numerous structures with the AFLOW prototype label A2B3\_mC20\_12\_2i\_3i or A3B2\_mC20\_12\_3i\_2i.  They are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files. 
 We have identified the following structures as sufficiently different to warrant their own prototypes: \begin{itemize} \item Prototypes with the label A2B3\_mC20\_12\_2i\_3i: \begin{itemize} \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B3_mC20_12_2i_3i-001}{$\beta$-Ga$_{2}$O$_{3}$} \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B3_mC20_12_2i_3i-003}{$\alpha$-As$_{2}$Te$_{3}$} (this structure) \end{itemize} ~ \vspace{-.25in} \item Prototypes with the label A3B2\_mC20\_12\_3i\_2i: \begin{itemize} \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B2_mC20_12_3i_2i-001}{Mo$_{2}$As$_{3}$} \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B2_mC20_12_3i_2i-002}{Gd$_{2}$Cl$_{3}$} \end{itemize} \end{itemize}
